column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Is it me or is a pizza supposed to have four specific things: dough
column4: and whatever other crap you choose to put on your pie ("toppings"). Well
column5: it was missing one very very vital thing! ...Sauce
column7: where art thou?! It was seriously just dough
column10: and GREASE. So much grease that I had to take napkins and soak it up in order to 'enjoy' a slice. [this was my second of all rant]
